nodes.text: Fleet command was the command structure of the naval branch of the New Republic during the Galactic Civil War against the Galactic Empire. Following a skirmish on Takodana, Inferno Squad asked Senator Leia Organa to approve a mission to Chinook Station to capture Imperial Admiral Garrick Versio since fleet command may not have approved of the squad undertaking a personal mission. Organa sympathized, and approved the mission.
